dict.acceptation: 比，比率；[数学]比例（法）；面积；相称，平衡；
使成比例；使相称；使均衡；

sent.orig: With increasing of the nitrogen proportion of blended coals, the nitrogen release proportion also increases linearly.
sent.trans: 随着混煤中含氮量的增加，热解过程中氮的析出率基本上保持线性增长。

sent.orig: The coal yield, gross income and optimum blending preparation proportion can be blending preparation proportion test.
sent.trans: 介绍了在选煤厂实施最大产率原则的基础上，调整不同的配洗比例预测精煤产率及毛收入，选取最佳、可行的配比。

sent.orig: The proportion factor was not consistent with proportion of rainfall per month.
sent.trans: 月降雨侵蚀力和降雨量所占比例季节分布不一致。

sent.orig: Broadly-defined Principle of proportion includes appropriate principle, necessity principle and narrowly-defined Principle of proportion.
sent.trans: 广义的比例原则包括适当性原则、要性原则和狭义的比例原则。

sent.orig: These tests might a liver biopsy in a significant proportion of those patients.
sent.trans: 这些测试能够使相当比例的这种患者免于肝活检。
